apple_vendor_description: This emoji on Apple devices features two individuals with distinct skin tones – one medium and one medium-light – leaning in for a tender kiss, their faces softly rendered with Apple's signature 3D glossy shading. The smooth gradients and realistic lighting give the pair a warm, approachable look, emphasizing intimacy and connection. As seen on Apple devices, this emoji beautifully represents romantic affection, shared moments, or a sweet expression of love between two people.
